description: The more, the merrier and for these brawlers, engaging in a Tag-team Bathroom Orgy is the winning ticket. Beaten and bruised, Jon Galt finds himself at the receiving end of Matt Majors' ass-punching. Trey Casteel, Nick Marino and Tommy Blade egg the action on. Trey joins the assault by slamming his cock down Jon's throat, then the other two join the fracas, with all five delivering the blows, the licks, the deep thrusts, until they've gone all 12 rounds and emerge triumphant.
title: Brawlers
